Not that I've pwnd that cum guzzling moron here is an HONEST review of the quality of this rip. Note that scores should ALWAYS be based on what a retail DVD/Blu-Ray would look like, not how good you think it is for a cam. That means nothing as it is a sliding scale; you might think cams look great while I think they look like shit.

Video: 5
Audio: 5
Movie: 6

Review:
The video is fuzzy, washed out, and there are several instances of people walking in front of camera. The sound is very flat and has virtually no dynamic range. All that being said it's still perfectly watchable and would score as fair to average for a cam in my opinion.

The movie itself is well directed, has good acting, and is nicely shot but if you've read the comics you pretty much know what's coming so there will be few surprises for you. I personally got bored halfway through so ended up watching it in two sittings.

awesome copy.
8/10 video
10/10 audio
